knowledge: European cucumber . The European cucumber (also known as English cucumber, burpless cucumber, hothouse cucumber, seedless cucumber, gourmet cucumber or greenhouse cucumber,) is a variety of "seedless" cucumber that is longer and slimmer than other varieties of cucumber.  They do not have a layer of wax on them, and the skin is tender when ripe.
